name: Dino Archie
bio:
I'm not doing that 3rd person tense as if someone else wrote this. I started out writing and acting but I always wanted to be funny. I love stand up. I like to make it feel like we're in a bar or living room where you can talk shit about anything and make it funny. I split my time between Vancouver and LA. Most recently, I won 1st place in the 2015 Seattle International Comedy Competition. In 2016, I made my standup television debut on Comedy Central’s “Adam Devine’s House Party.” I have opened up for Hannibal Buress, Reggie Watts and toured with Chris D'elia on the “Under No Influence Tour.”

My debut CD “Choosy Lover” is available to stream at www.dinoarchie.com
